channel.title: Shroggscape v1 317 development team!
channel.description:
[center][u][i][b][size=30pt]shroggscape v1 development team! [/size] [/b][/i][/u]
OK in the past few weeks Ive been coding a 317 server. it has got all of the usual things, but lately I've been a bit chilaxed and i decided i need some co-coders.
we will be using drop-box for the server coding. if you don't know what it is look at [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,368114.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,368114.0.html[/url] it is really handy. trust me
so, here's the server and the team so far.
[size=20pt][i][b]TEAM[/b][/i][/size]
[i]coders[/i] me (shrogg) ???? ????
[size=20pt][i][b]THE SERVER SO FAR.[/b][/i][/size]
the server uses a devolution v7 base which is working very well. i have coded some skills to work but i am still working on:
fetching wood cutting mining agility farming herblore cooking
The server consists of 3 [i]"homes"[/i], these homes are places for players of around the same combat or skill levels to hang out.
each "home" consists of shops, mini games, quests and training areas
[size=15pt][i]the homes are:[/i][/size] NOOB: ENTRANA MEDIUM LEVEL: DRAYNOR HIGH LEVEL:TZARR
[b][i]PICTURES.[/i][/b]
Some noob shops
[img]http://shroggscapev1.webs.com/shops.bmp[/img]
Noob training area
[img]http://shroggscapev1.webs.com/noob%20training.bmp[/img]
Medium level travel to "dragon island". i try to make the travel look as realistic as posible
[img]http://shroggscapev1.webs.com/dragons.bmp[/img]
Combat
[img]http://shroggscapev1.webs.com/dragon.bmp[/img]
[size=20pt]pm me if you want to join =)[/size]
BTW: here's my proof =)
[quote="Newty"][quote author=shrogg link=action=profile;u=312003 date=1245039048] hey newty, can i please post a development thread?
cheers, shrogg [/quote]
Sure, as long as it doesn't break any rules and you post proof that you have actually started a project; such as pictures, etc.[/quote]
OK, that's done..
[size=19pt]thanks for reading!![/size] [/center]

item.title: Shroggscape v1 317 development team!
item.dc:creator: @CAPT_AMERIKA AMERIKA
item.description:
@CAPT_AMERIKA wrote:

Skullator:

Why would you want to use an old Devolution if you could use Final Devolution 2.5, with perfect PVP?

Would you rather work with a shitty server that you know needs work or one that is like 99.999999% done. If I were shrogg, I would try to use maybe rs2dv or even try to make my own server from scratch. That is a great development team

Read full topic

item.title: Shroggscape v1 317 development team!
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

lol well i wanted to set myself a challange =)
anyways its working fine =)

Read full topic

item.title: Shroggscape v1 317 development team!
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

[center][size=30pt]shroggscape v1 development team!
[/size]

OK in the past few weeks Ive been coding a 317 server.
it has got all of the usual things, but lately I’ve been a bit chilaxed and i decided i need some co-coders.

we will be using drop-box for the server coding.
if you don’t know what it is look at http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,368114.0.html
it is really handy. trust me

so, here’s the server and the team so far.

[size=20pt]TEAM[/size]

coders
me (shrogg)
???
???

[size=20pt]THE SERVER SO FAR.[/size]

the server uses a devolution v7 base which is working very well.
i have coded some skills to work but i am still working on:

fetching
wood cutting
mining
agility
farming
herblore
cooking

The server consists of 3 “homes”, these homes are places for players of around the same combat
or skill levels to hang out.

each “home” consists of shops, mini games, quests and training areas

[size=15pt]the homes are:[/size]
NOOB: ENTRANA
MEDIUM LEVEL: DRAYNOR
HIGH LEVEL:TZARR

PICTURES.

Some noob shops

Noob training area

Medium level travel to “dragon island”. i try to make the travel look as realistic as posible

Combat

[size=20pt]pm me if you want to join =)[/size]

BTW: here’s my proof =)

[quote=“Newty”][quote author=shrogg link=action=profile;u=312003 date=1245039048]
hey newty, can i please post a development thread?

cheers, shrogg
[/quote]

Sure, as long as it doesn’t break any rules and you post proof that you have actually started a project; such as pictures, etc.[/quote]

OK, that’s done…

[size=19pt]thanks for reading!![/size]
[/center]
